statements: SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE date_of_visit = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, date_of_visit, treatment_plan FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT date_of_visit, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM health_records ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Pneumonia' ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE date_of_visit >= '2021-01-01' AND date_of_visit <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_visit ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND diagnosis LIKE '%Infection%' ORDER BY patient_id, date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC, patient_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, patient_id, date_of_visit, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM health_records ORDER BY patient_id, date_of_visit LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_health_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Physical';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM health_trends WHERE trend_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, health_condition FROM patient_health_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, health_condition FROM patient_health_records WHERE health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Mental Health' AND trend_name IN ('Anxiety', 'Depression') ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM health_trends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT staff_name, specialization, email FROM medical_staff WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 5 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT h.record_id, h.diagnosis, p.patient_name FROM health_records h JOIN patients p ON h.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT s.specialization FROM medical_staff s WHERE s.specialization LIKE '%Surgeon%' OR s.specialization LIKE '%Doctor%';
SELECT p.patient_name, h.diagnosis, h.record_date FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE h.diagnosis IS NOT NULL ORDER BY h.record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date, reason FROM providers JOIN appointments ON providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT patients.patient_name, providers.provider_name, providers.provider_specialty FROM patients JOIN providers ON patients.patient_id = providers.provider_id WHERE providers.provider_specialty = 'Cardiology'

SELECT patients.patient_name, encounters.encounter_date, diagnoses.diagnosis_description FROM patients JOIN encounters ON patients.patient_id = encounters.patient_id JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id WHERE encounters.encounter_type = 'Checkup' AND diagnoses.diagnosis_code = 'A01'

SELECT patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name, medications.medication_dosage, medications.medication_instructions FROM patients JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE medications.medication_dosage LIKE '%mg%'
